text: Elsa & Fred is a 2014 American comedy-drama movie directed by Michael Radford. It stars Shirley MacLaine and Christopher Plummer. The movie, set and filmed in New Orleans. It is an English-language remake of the 2005 Argentinian movie of the same name. It was released on November 7, 2014. ==References== Category:2014 comedy-drama movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Mexican movies Category:Puerto Rican movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Radford Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Elsa & Fred (2014 movie)
